description: Ensure visible labels are included in accessible names for interactive controls.
recommendation: Keep aria-label or aria-labelledby text in sync with the visible label. (WCAG 2.1 SC 2.5.3)
algorithm: Compares visible labels on buttons/links/input buttons against aria-label/labelledby/title and flags mismatches.
algorithm_advanced: Compares normalized visible label text for buttons/links/input buttons against aria-label/labelledby/title strings and flags non-matching accessible names.
